jobDescription: Robert Half's long time client is is a growing startup in Palo Alto is seeking a Data Analyst. This role will end up running all things data for this company. They have grown to around 200 employees. They are moving to a Postgres DB but experience with Postgres not required. ETL. Reporting, and SQL. This is more of a data / database role than a BI or analytics role. This position is direct hire and offers great benefits.  For immediate consideration please send resumes to cooper.mckay@rht.com. Local Bay Area candidates only. Must be eligible to work in the U.S.
